translations: n.（船只或飞机遇险时用的）无线电求救信号

phrs.translation: 五月天, 空中浩劫, 月天, 求救信号
五月天专辑列表, 五月天列表
五月天, 突然好想你, 第二人生, 干杯
无线电求救呼号, 船只或飞机发出的
五月天, 我们是五月天

sentences.sentence: He raced to pick up the life jackets while his stepmother sent out a Mayday call.
sentences.translation: 他的继母发出无线电求救信号，他飞跑着去拿救生衣。

sentences.sentence: For decades, MayDay parades in Moscow have taken place under clear blue skies, aircraft having deposited dry ice, silver iodide and cement powder to disperse clouds.
sentences.translation: 几十年来，莫斯科的五月节游行都是在晴朗的蓝天下举行的，他们飞机上撒下干冰、碘化银和水泥粉来驱散云层。

sentences.sentence: Apparently, no mayday call was issued.
sentences.translation: 显然，没有发出求救呼吁。
